explains: adj. 缺乏的，不足的；有缺点的，有缺陷的

sentences.en: Deaf people are sometimes treated as being mentally deficient.
sentences.cn: 耳聋的人有时被看作智力不健全。

sentences.en: Soils are most commonly deficient in nitrogen and phosphorus.
sentences.cn: 土壤最经常缺乏氮和磷。

sentences.en: Nitrogen-deficient plants exhibit many of the symptoms just described.
sentences.cn: 缺氮植物表现出上述的许多症状。
